snippet: Lucas Glover withdrew from the Sony Open in Honolulu with a sprained right knee that still is not strong enough for him to play golf.
lead_paragraph: Lucas Glover withdrew from the Sony Open in Honolulu with a sprained right knee that still is not strong enough for him to play golf.

headline.seo: Golfer Glover Out of Sony Open
